name: quibble
description: Makes it easy to replace require'd dependencies.

scripts.test:esm: if node test/supports-esm.js; then NODE_OPTIONS=--loader=quibble ./test/esm-lib/teenytest-proxy.js './test/esm-lib/*.test.{mjs,js}'; fi
scripts.test:no-loader-esm: if node test/supports-esm.js; then teenytest './test/esm-lib/*.no-loader-test.{mjs,js}'; fi
scripts.test:example-esm: if node test/supports-esm.js; then node test/supports-esm.js && cd example && npm it; fi
scripts.test:ci: npm test && npm run test:esm && npm run test:no-loader-esm && npm run style && npm run test:example && npm run test:example-esm && npm run test:smells
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
